import React, { Component} from 'react' import Afternav from "../Coponent/nav_after"; export default class Host extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { rid:"01", sid:"s01", slug:"", type: "", city: "", Suburb:"", Address:"", name: "", description: "", price: "", capacity: 0, pets: false, breakfast: false, airconditioner: false, carpark: false, wifi: false, gym: false, kitchen: false, url1: "", url2:"", url3:"", url4:"", url5:"" } } handleSubmit1= (event) =>{ let url="http://127.0.0.1:8081/v2/room"; const data=this.state; const id = parseInt(data.rid, 10)+1; data.rid=id.toString(); console.log(data); fetch(url,{ method: 'post', headers:{ 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/xml' }, body: JSON.stringify(data) }).then((result) => { result.json().then((resp)=>{ console.log(resp) if(resp==="Succeed"){ alert("succeed") } }) }) this.setState({ [this.state.rid]:data.rid+2 }) console.log("rid",this.state.rid) } handleInputChange = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } handleInputChange1 =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(e.target.value ==="on"){ this.setState({ [e.target.name] : true }) } } handleInputChang2 = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() const parsed = parseInt(event.target.value, 10); this.setState({ [event.target.name] : parsed }) } render() { const { type,address,name,description,price,city,Suburb,url1,url2,url3,url4,url5} = this.state return (

Upload accommodation

1 room type

2 address

3 city

4 suburb

5 room name

6 price

7 description

8 Select Facilities

9 upload images



); } }
